papers.title: Next-to-Leading-Order Prediction for the Neutrinoless Double-Beta Decay
papers.authors: Y. L. Yang and P. W. Zhao
papers.summary: Author(s): Y. L. Yang and P. W. ZhaoThe neutrinoless double-beta decay ($0νββ$) of two neutrons $nn→ppee$ is the elementary subprocess of $0νββ$ decay in nuclei. Accurate knowledge of the $nn→ppee$ amplitude is required to pin down the short-range contributions in the nuclear matrix elements of the candidate nuclei for large-scale $0ν…[Phys. Rev. Lett. 134, 242502] Published Fri Jun 20, 2025
